*div1 type="summary"* *p*Concerning a disputed land title.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-29-1825">29th September 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*There is likely to be some difficulty between *person_mentioned*William Milican*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Whitesides boys*/person_mentioned* I will Explain the circumstances to you and wish your opinion *person_mentioned*Henry and Boland Whitesides*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Jack C. Davis*/person_mentioned*applied to me Jointly for Land I agreed to let them have the League of Land to be Equally divided but when *person_mentioned*Sims*/person_mentioned* made his Return he left out the name of *person_mentioned*Davis*/person_mentioned* and the Deed came out in the name of *person_mentioned*Henry and Boland Whiteside*/person_mentioned* of which I Informed them when I delivered to them the deed they agreed it should make no difference that they wood secure to *person_mentioned*Davis*/person_mentioned**location_mentioned* one Third of said League of Land*/location_mentioned* as Soon as It was convenient *person_mentioned*Mr. Milican*/person_mentioned* has now bot one Third of the Land from *person_mentioned*Henry Whiteside*/person_mentioned* and has taken his obligation to make him a Deed to It he has also bot *person_mentioned*Davis*/person_mentioned* land which constitutes another Third they made a Division of the Land as appears from the manner in which they have disposed of It. this is the only Evidence of, a Division *person_mentioned*Boland Whiteside*/person_mentioned* now contends for One Half of the League of Land and says that as no Legal Division has been made he is not bound to be governed by the sales that were made he further contends that *person_mentioned*Davis*/person_mentioned* has no Right to the Land that he has got the Deed and will hold the Land Now the question is wheather *person_mentioned*Davis*/person_mentioned* Sale of the Land wood Intitle *person_mentioned*Mr. Milican*/person_mentioned* to It or not or wheather *person_mentioned*Davis*/person_mentioned* could hold the Land himself Independant of *person_mentioned*Boland*/person_mentioned*s opposition and wheather the Division made among them previous to *person_mentioned*Mr. Milican*/person_mentioned*s purchasing this Land wood be considered obligatory or Legal *person_mentioned*Mr Milican*/person_mentioned* on faith of the Contract made with *person_mentioned*Davis*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Henry Whiteside*/person_mentioned* has moved on to the Land with his *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*your opinion on the subject might Enable me to have the matter arranged without any further difficulty or otherwise the Business will come before you for Decission*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jno P Coles*/person_mentioned* [Rubric],*/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. S. F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr. Patch*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
